title: Lightning Dragon
description: Dragon Shifter Novel The last thing Tamara expected was to be snatched away by a winged beast. This hadn’t been part of the brief. Was this normal hunt behavior? Surely not. Tamara had a really bad feeling about this. Once the feeling settled in the pit of her stomach, it wouldn’t let go.  The Story Contains strong sexual themes/language and is not intended for readers under the age of 18.
author: Charlene Hartnady
